Docs.summary: The Service Bus Management API is a REST API for managing Service Bus queues, topics, rules and subscriptions. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/hh780776.aspx for more information)

Docs.summary: Checks the availability of the given service namespace across all Windows Azure subscriptions. This is useful because the domain name is created based on the service namespace name. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/jj870968.aspx for more information)
Docs.returns: The response to a query for the availability status of a namespace name.

Docs.summary: Checks the availability of the given service namespace across all Windows Azure subscriptions. This is useful because the domain name is created based on the service namespace name. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/jj870968.aspx for more information)
Docs.returns: The response to a query for the availability status of a namespace name.
